Title: The Remaining Sunreavers
Description:
There's still a number of significant Sunreavers who haven't been accounted for. Odds are that they're in the Sunreaver's Sanctuary, caught by surprise.

<Rommath hands you an artifact, clearly made by blood elf hands.>

The place is crawling with Silver Covenant. You'll need to get in, use the Tear to evacuate the VIPs, and then get out.

Stay alive, $n.
ObjectivesText: Use the Tear of the Sin'dorei on Uda the Beast, High Arcanist Savor, Magister Hathorel, Magister Surdiel, and Magistrix Vesara.
